quotes.message: Couples who move in to together should use the opportunity of the honeymoon period to make positive changes to their diet and lifestyle by working together and supporting each other.
quotes.name: Amelia Lake

quotes.message: Go to a place where you're not going to be stressed, because a honeymoon itself can be a stressful thing.
quotes.name: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.message: A honeymoon is a short period of doting between dating and debting.
quotes.name: Ray Bandy

quotes.message: Short honeymoons are better than no honeymoons, but long honeymoons are best of all.
quotes.name: John Davey

quotes.message: The honeymoon is not actually over until we cease to stifle our yawns.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: My clothes are great for a honeymoon: They're light and sexy, colorful and pretty, and not expensive.
quotes.name: Diane von Furstenberg Sex

quotes.message: The honeymoon is the unforgettable period in a couple's life. Later in life, tried and tired in the dust and mist of relations, together or not, they would always miss that time they spent together. Every bit of it.
quotes.name: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.message: Honeymoons are the beginning of wisdom but the beginning of wisdom is the end of romance.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: Your honeymoon tells the world and maybe you who you are.
quotes.name: Ginger Strand

quotes.message: Honeymoon lasts not nowadays above a fortnight.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Happiness consists of living each day as if it were the first day of your honeymoon and the last day of your vacation.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Our honeymoon will shine our life long: its beams will only fade over your grave or mine.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: It was a honeymoon at first, with people feeling like brothers and sisters. It was beautiful.
quotes.name: Stanford Siver

quotes.message: The honeymoon is the only period when a woman isn't trying to reform her husband.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: That honeymoon phase is so much fun in real life, when you meet and discover somebody new and fall in love and chase them. The pursuit. And that climactic final moment of ultimate togetherness.
quotes.name: Lucas Neff
